Name: Latest Featured
Intro Text:
Today’s featured article is a preview of what paid subscribers get every week – our most popular newsletter, The Latest.

Ever see a headline and wonder, "Should I actually be worried about this?" That's exactly what The Latest is for. Each week, Emily breaks down new research and trending headlines, separating what's worth paying attention to from what doesn't hold up in the data.

The Latest is included with a paid subscription so you can make decisions for your family based on evidence, not TikTok trends.
